div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
decimooctauo die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra

The said day margaret Couper grantit that scho had Ressauit fra
Johnne of Kintor xij s' iiij d' in part of Pament of xxviij s'
iiij d' in the name and behalf of mery obery

The said day Alexander hay Come Souerte to the baillies to
tutir Dauid hay his brodir sone befor thame one our lady evin
nixt tocum in the tolbutht to ansuer tile malcum of crag for
xij s'

The saide day thome mar' grantit that the wax come neuir out of the
kyst that Johne Andirsone sulde freith him of the fraucht

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' thomas Waus
forspekar that the borghe' fundin be thome moir' one Johne andirsone
that he aw to freitht him of the fraucht of ane preis' kyst and of thre stane of
wax in It was fundin of nayn' availl and because' the saide Jhone to put to pay
the fraucht of the kyst and the fraucht of the wax vteuthe
the kyst

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxjo die nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day Johne of mydiltone and Johne of meldrum oblist thame be
the fathtis of thar bodiis to stande and abide at the ordinance and deliuerance
of thomas leslie Johne mar' Williame blinsele and Richerde Waus Anent ale
debatis betuix thame

head.add: Johne myle at the Justice myle

div.p:
the saide day the aldirman balyeis and the Counsal present for the tym'
ordanit and chargit Johne of myle to Remane with the half of the Justice
myll' to witsonday that nixt cumis and to pay his maile Ande at the
saide terme thai being prisit and deulie lest and bigit thai haue dischargit
him frathinfurtht

The saide day marione' brovne grantit and opinlie declarit be hir'
aithe that scho was feit with thome Waus and resauit ij s' of hir' fee
or euere Johne Duncansone or his wif Spak to hir' of ony feing

The saide day Androw Skynner lauchfullie warnit to preiwe Johne
Skynner his seruand' nocht comperit tharfor the balyeis fande the saide Johne
dischargit and fre of the said Androw and habill to fee him quhar he
plesit and the saide Androw in Ane Amerciament of the court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxviijo die Nouembris

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis grantit licence to
the Smithtis to cheis' ane dekin of thar' craft ande
to present the faltis to the tone that hapinnis to be committit Amang
thame for this Instant yer'

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avise of Androw Cullan
mastir of the kirk werk feit and conducit Dauid Wricht mason'
to wirk continualie at Sanct nicholes werk one vigill'
and ale vthir dais siclik as the masounis wirkis at my lorde
of Abirdene werk and to halde nayn' vthir haly dais than thai vs'
for the quhilkis thai sal pay to him xxiiijor merkis Ande the said'
Dauy was oblist and Suorne the gret aithe to be leiel and trew to the
said' werk and to wirk continualie for the profit of the samyn

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day Williame colp procurator to Dauy Colp excepit
and opponit Agane Sandy stabillar his wyf and douchtir
sayande and allegeand' that thai mycht nocht be sufficient
preuys aganis him in the actioun debatabile betuix his
saide sone Dauy colp and Alexander prat Anent the layng of
ane Siluer belt in wede because thai war' byall as he
allegit protestand quhat euere happin' thame to depone suld'
turne him to nay preiudice as procurator to his said' Sone
considiring thai war nocht Suorne befor this protestacioun'

Eodem die margereta litstar et Katherina litstar fecerunt constituerunt
et ordinarunt thomam gledstane et Richardum litstar suos procuratores legittimos coniunctim
et diuisim ad prosequendum cacabum et alia bona sibi Jure hereditario contingenti
per decessum quondam Andree litstar fratris suj agendum prosequendum defendendum
promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis
necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo die
Decembris anno quo supra

Alexander Stallar deponit be his aitht that he bystande herd and saw and for witnes
was tane quhen Williame buchane laid the Siluere belt followit be Dauid Colp
tile alexander prat in wed of five franche crownis quhilk v franche crownys
was gevin to Waltir blaklug for quhet bocht fra hyme be the said Williame
Anent the tua stane of woll he knawis nocht

Cristiane mortymer deponis be hir aithe that scho bystand herd ande saw
and for witnes was tane quhen Williame buchane laid the saide
siluer bell to Waltir blaklug in wed of fyve bollis of quhet Ilkane boll
a franche crovne and thareftir the said William was put in the tolbutht for the
red of the said belt and he causit the said belt be deliuerit to Sandy prat
in wed of fyve franche crovnys Of the quhilkis he borrowit iij li'
fra thome pratis wif and red the laid him self And thareftir scho herd
say William buchane was content he held the belt quhill he was pait
of tua stane of woll

Mawy Stablar deponis ande concordis witht the said cristiane
in al thingis

Johnne of kintor deponit be his aitht that he saw alexander prat
pay v franche crovnys to Waltir blaklug for quhet bocht fra him
be Williame buchane and herd him say he had na thing for It bot
a belt was nocht worth the Some

The saide day the balyeis continevit the oppinnyng of the said' witnes and
the warde and dome tharof quhile the nynt day of Januar'
nixt to cum to the hed' court of the said' burghe' to be haldin the said'
day for waknes of the court with consent of batht the said partiis
but preiudice of ony party in siclik force and effect as It standis this day

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day Williame buchan grantit to pay xij s' to mastir
Alexander bisset of the annuele of his lande liand in futy of the termes
bigan

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Dauy menyes forspekar that thome smitht and his wif sal mend'
the skatht done to Richerd ruthirfurdis wifis clathtis thai being sene
be gude mene et cetera

The saide day the borghe' fundin one Dauy Williamsone be
Sandy brabner for the wranguis' haldin of his seruande Janie
hatmakar was fundin avale for the quhilkis the saide Dauy was
in Ane amerciament of the court and the saide James seruand to the saide
Alexander to witsonday that nixt cumis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiudem xjo
die Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day Johne thomsone grantit to pay ane barrell of tar or
the price of it to Johne arthour'

the saide day Williame scrimgeour sergeande at commavnde of the balyeis
chargit Androw nachtj to Remane within the tolbutht quhil he pait
Alexander gray ane Rede of yrne

The saide day gilbert tulidef be his avne toung grant was in
amerciament of the court for the brekin of commonce ordinance and in brekin
of the pas' of breid' of quhet and to Amende as law will and
forber' in tyme to Cum

Eodem die Johannes arthour' nomine vxoris sue amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex
ore alexandri Rede prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio mariorie menyes Cuj emen
dabit ut Jura volunt et dicta marioria conuicta de perturbio dicte mu
lieris

Eodem die Johannes thomsone amerciatur per dictam assisam pro perturbio
henrici hoge Et Idem henricus amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Johannis
ac pro perturbio mariorie menyeis Sponse dicti Johannis et quilibet
alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Elizabetht bogy amerciatur per dictam assisam pro perturbio
mariote frery ac fractione he Ostij Johannis chamer quilibet emen
dabit ut Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo nono
die mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

Eodem mariota Kintor amerciatur per assisam ex ore patricij lesly prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio Agnetis meldrum Et dicta agnes amerciatur per perturbio
dicte mariote et quilibet alterj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day Johne Watsone tuk to preive one friday that nixt
cumis befor the baillies quhat maile he tuk the hous' that he Inhabitis for
And to preif that he hade pait his maile

Eodem die thomas Waus deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextre
ostendem quod gilbertus Tulideff et vxor sua erunt indempnes pro Willelmo goldsmytht
aliter quam per viam Juris Et Richardus Waus Junior deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
Willelmus goldsmytht et vxor sua erunt indempnes pro dicto gilberto et vxor sua
Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum plegios suos indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia Capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
ixo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo Secundo quo die sectis
vocatis et Curia Affirmata absens patent in Rotulo Secte

The saide day the ballieis Counsale and Communite gathtreit and Circualy Inquerit
be Williame scrimgeour officiar maide constitut and ordanit Alexander menyeis aldirman
and Johne of mar' ane of the balyeis thar lauchfule procuratoris coniunctlie and seueralie
to Comper befor our Souerane lorde ande his Counsale at this nixt cession'
to defend' the Summonce Impetrat one thame be mastir Androw Cadiow Anent
the defence of ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik et cetera Ande tueching the Retrettin'
of ane decret gottin and decretit to ws tharupone and to follou him for Costis skathtis
and expensis maid' and Sustenit tharthrow and in ale vthir actionis concerning thame Ande
ordanit to mak ane procuratour to thame and Sele It with thar commone Sele
Ande thai promittit oppinlie to gif Resonabill expensis and costis to the said' aldirman
and balyeis for thar' labouris In the promiss'

The saide' day the aldirman and ballieis continevit the actioun' debatabile betuix Dauid
Colp one that ane part Ande Alexander prat one that vthir anent ane Siluer belt
et cetera to the law day nixt eftir pasche immediate hereftir follouing in siclik forme and effect
as it standis this day with consent of William Colp procurator for the said' Dauid and the
saide Alexander without preiudice tile ony part

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Kynninmonde capellanus
perpetuus altaris Sancte Katherine virginis infra ecclesiam cathedralem Abirdonensis situati
protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex marcarum vsualis monete scocie sibi et
dice altarij a longo tempore debito et non soluto Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibilie preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in
Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Johanne sclatar Alexandro moresone et Andrea nachtj seriendo

The said' day Alexander gray yongar oblist him tile Entir nichole glenny strenyeable'
for thre stane and hald ane Stane of woll befor the balyeis within this tolbutht
this day xv dais to Ansuer to Alexander King or ellis tile ansuer' to the said'
Alexander King tharfor

Eodem die Accedens ad barram d Johannes blak et protestabatur
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu duarum marcarum vsuale
monete scocie annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluet de quadam
terra vasta Jactente in vico Nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter
terras gilberti Waus et quondam thome prat ex orientali et boreali partibus
et Communiones vias regias versus occidens et Austrum ad quam terram
Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus
Testibus Johanne sclatar Alexandro moresone et Andrea nachtj seriendo Symone
Robertson' Alexandro moreson' et gilberto prestone seriendo

Eodem die Accedens ad barram magister Alexander fyf capellanus ac
procurator Altaris Sancti nicholaij infra ecclesiam parrochialem eiusdem burgi fundati
et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' et octo
d' vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto Altarj a longo tempore debito et
non soluet de quadam terra vasta quondam Symonis masone Jacente
in vico de le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Johannis talyour ex australi et terram quondam mathei Wricht
ex boreali partibus ab altera ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in Curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Roberto Walcar' Duncano
gilrutht et Andrea nachtj seriendo

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister Alexander fyf capellanus ac procurator altaris
Sancti Nicholaij et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Red
ditu duorum solidorum vsuale monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj a longo tempore
debito et non soluet de quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis hill Jacente in
vico viridi inter terram quondam Roberti moresone ex Orientali et communionem
venellam qua Itur ad domum fratrem carmelitarum ex occidentali Ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Roberto Walcar' Duncano gilrutht et Andrea Nachtj seriendo

Eodem die accedens ad barram Walterus honyson' et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu xv s' sibi annuatim debito de terra Dauid colp penitus vasta
Jacente in Cono vici castri ex occidentali parte carnificij inter Communiones vias
regias versus oriens austrum et boream et terra versus occi
dens ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne
grene Willelmo King et gilberto prestone seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram dominus Johannes prat capellanus alteris Sancte crucis et thome
protestabtur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu xij s' et iiijor alio annuo Redditu iiijor d' sibi debito de
quadam terra penitus vaste Jacente in vico castrj inter terram Johannis Retre ex
australi et communionem viam regiam ex boreali terram Alexander matheson versus occidens et
portam versus oriens ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuos in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus cristallo prat Andrea tulibo et Johanne cuk seriendo

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Richardus Waus et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditu duorum s' trium solidorum vsuale monete scocie sibi annuatim debito de quadam
terra vasta quondam Johannis Waus Jacente in le futy inter terram quondam Andree murray ex australi
et terram quondam Willelmum harpar ex boreali ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Johanne grene Willelmo King et gilberto prestone seriendo

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes arnot minister
domus Sancte trinitatis de Abirdene et pretestabatur in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu sex s' et octo d' vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto loco
a longo tempore debito et non soluet de quadam terra vasta Johanni litstar
pertinenti Jacente in vico viridi inter Communionem venellam ex Orientali et terram
quondam Johannis Durvarde ex Occidentali et communionem viam regiam versus boream
Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Roberto Walcar' Duncano gilrutht et Andrea nachtj seriendo
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in Pretorio eiusdem xvj die Januarij quo supra

The saide day Androw Cullane present his cownt of the kirkwerk apone the
commone kyst of this yer' bigane and askit to be dischargit tharof
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xx die Januarij quo supra

Eodem die cristina Iruyne fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Richardum Waus
legittimum suum procuratorem dans et concedens eidem suam potestatem et man
datum Speciale pro se et nomine suo ad petendum et recipiendum xxiij s' a Richardo
beruis exinde acquitandum Et si necessitate fuit Richardum prosequendum agendum
defendendum promittens de Rato et grato Cum ceteris clausulis necesseriis et oportunis

The said' day Alexander myrtone gravntit him borghe' to thome meldrum for iiijor
bollis of bark for Androw burnat to be pait be pasche nixt to cum

The said' day Johne chamer grantit him aving twa barrellis of Salmond'
to William Rete quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
or ellis Set Sufficient souerte to the said' William to pay him the said'
tua barrellis of Salmond' at lammes nixt to Cum

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Januarij anno
quo supra

The saide day the wif of thome sadlar' / the wif of cristy prat
marione ranalde the widew of Alexander traile / the wif of Androw beltar' the wyf
of Johne Symmer the wif of Will Coupar / the wyf of moryce talyour'
and the wif of Johne hay Cordoner' was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' thomas
Waus forspekar for breking of commone ordinance in the hendiring and spilling
of the mercat In housing of wittallis or thai be present to the mercat and tappyne
furtht Agane of the Sammyn and In bying of wittallis or lauchfule tyme et cetera
for the quhilkis ilkan of thame was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera and to amend' as law
will and forber' in tym' to cum Atour It was deliuerit be the saide assis' for the common'
gude of the towne that gif it happinis ony of the said personis tile hendir the
mercat or committ ony sic trespas in tyme to Cum and beis conuict tharof Sall pay to
Sanct nicholes werl xl s' vnforgevin and salbe secludit the mercat ane yer' thareftir
